prompt.text: For the majority of Afghans, religion is considered:

feedback.text: While adherence may vary, Islam is the foundation of political and public interaction, and private life practices for devout Muslims. Always act as if your counterparts are devout followers.

Actually, while adherence may vary, Islam is the foundation of political and public interaction, and private life practices for devout Muslims. Always act as if your counterparts are devout followers.

translation.text: Private, and separate from political views.

feedback.text: Actually, while adherence may vary, Islam is the foundation of political and public interaction, and private life practices for devout Muslims. Always act as if your counterparts are devout followers.

translation.text: Unimportant, but followed for the sake of tradition.

feedback.text: Actually, Muslims are proud of their religion. It is the foundation of political and public interaction, and private life practices. Always act as if your counterparts are devout followers.
